=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Lace Front Wigs Human Hair Pre Plucked with Baby Hair Body Wave 4x4 Transparent Lace Closure Wigs for Black Women 150% Density 10A Gread Unprocessed Brazilian Virgin Human Hair Wigs Natural Color (18")
Review Date: 2021/10/06
Store: K KF BEAUTY U
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'K KF BEAUTY U', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '10.94 x 9.53 x 2.36 inches; 9.14 Ounces'}
Review Text: Soft hair that doesn’t shed. I love the lace, as it makes it easier to blend with skin and the free gifts (edge scarf, rat tail comb, and wig caps) were a welcomed addition.
Review Title: Great Hair!!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Butterfly Locs Crochet Hair 12 Inch Pre Twisted Braiding Hair Butterfly Locs Crochet Hair 6 Packs Crochet Hair Braids for Black Women Distressed Butterfly Locs Crochet Hair 1B
Review Date: 2021/10/16
Store: INMESTLY
Average Rating: 3.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'INMESTLY', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Extension Length': '12 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '7.99 x 6.14 x 3.46 inches; 6.38 Ounces', 'UPC': '191171101532'}
Review Text: Very lifelike and looks just like my actual hair. It also came with a crochet tool which makes installation easy!
Review Title: Looks Natural
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Deep Wave Wig Natural Human Hair 13x4 Transparent Lace Front Wigs Human Hair for Black Women Pre Plucked Brazilian Virgin Hair 150% Density Deep Curly Wave Lace Frontal Wigs
Review Date: 2021/10/28
Store: amzhair
Average Rating: 2.2
Product Details: {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Brand': 'amzhair', 'Package Dimensions': '13.7 x 8.7 x 3.43 inches; 9.91 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'dpwig'}
Review Text: The wig is quite long which I love, and it is easy to wear in different  styles. The lace blends to your skin nicely and no weird wig smell. I did have to pluck it a bit to create a natural looking part, but it is awesome overall.
Review Title: Great Wig!!!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: VTAOZI Lace Front Wigs Human Hair Straight 4x4 Lace Closure Wigs for Black Women Pre Plucked with Baby Hair 150% Density Brazilian Straight Lace Front Closure Wigs Human Hair 18 Inch
Review Date: 2022/01/02
Store: VTAOZI
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Material': 'Human', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'VTAOZI', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '11.61 x 9.37 x 1.42 inches; 8.15 Ounces'}
Review Text: The first thing I noticed upon unboxing was the softness and the smell (or lack of one) which is positive, and the lace needed very little work to blend to my hair, which makes this an awesome wig to own.
Review Title: Don’t wait, buy this wig!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Satin Bonnet Silk Sleep Cap for Women, layajia Satin Bonnet for Curly Hair Long Hair Women Sleeping
Review Date: 2022/01/20
Store: layajia
Average Rating: 3.1
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 5.16 x 0.91 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'FM007-CA-Green', 'Department': 'womens', 'UPC': '798610306611'}
Review Text: I like the color and the satin feel, however I’d say to use it for flatter hairstyles, because my braids don’t currently fit in the bonnet. Overall good product.
Review Title: It’s good!
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The individual exhibits a strong inclination towards hair products, particularly wigs and braiding hair, indicating a preference for various styles and textures. Ratings suggest a mixed sentiment, as they express satisfaction with some products (notably human hair wigs) while finding others mediocre or disappointing, particularly in terms of synthetic options. 

Common themes reveal a preference for quality, with higher ratings correlated to products that are soft, easy to use, and require minimal adjustment for natural appearance, emphasizing the importance of realistic looks and ease of installation. The recurring complaint about synthetic hair suggests a lower overall satisfaction compared to human hair, which they seem to favor, indicating a willingness to invest in higher-quality options.

Quality is a consistent theme, as they favor products with minimal shedding, good lace blending, and lifelike appearances. They also seem sensitive to price, as reflected in their mixed ratings for lower-cost items. The presence of accessories or extra items (like edge scarves and braiding tools) appears to enhance their satisfaction when included, indicating that complementary products add value to their shopping experience.

In summary, this individual's core preferences center around high-quality, realistic human hair products with functional designs while maintaining awareness of cost-effectiveness in their selections.

target_interaction.title: Quality wig
target_interaction.text: This wig is great, it has minimal shedding and the lace is truly transparent and almost invisible.  This is a quality product.
